tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE nuclear_waste_storage_facility (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type VARCHAR(255),
  quantity INT,
  storage_location VARCHAR(255),
  disposal_method VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type VARCHAR(255),
  quantity INT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  storage_status VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE disposal_procedures (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  procedure_name VARCHAR(255),
  method VARCHAR(255),
  disposal_site VARCHAR(255),
  cost DECIMAL(10,2),
  completion_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE disposal_procedures (
  procedure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_id INT,
  waste_type_id INT,
  disposal_date TIMESTAMP,
  disposed_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE inventory ( 
   id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
   facility_name VARCHAR(50), 
   waste_type VARCHAR(50), 
   quantity INT, 
   storage_location VARCHAR(50) 
 );
